description: female doll; seated with hands held in front of body, palms inward; white face and hands; wearing elaborate multicolored clothing, predominantly purple, orange and gold; seated on light green plastic "bamboo" and multicolored dias which fits on top of black plastic base with gold floral ornamentation on front
dimension: 7 3/4 x 9 x 7 in. (19.69 x 22.86 x 17.78 cm) (single element, doll)
title: Male Doll, from a Set of Hina Dolls
